metadata.titleEn: Monitoring data on lake water temperature in Bangong Co and Dagze Co (2012-2013)
metadata.titleCn: 班公错、达则错湖水温度监测数据集（2012-2013）
metadata.description:
Lake water temperature data, including water temperature values at different water depths, were collected in Bangong Co and Dagze Co.
Data collection time:
Bangong Co: July 30, 2012, to August 20, 2013
Dagze Co: August 18, 2012, to August 29, 2013
Data sampling interval: 1 hour
Instruments used for data acquisition: HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 thermometer from ONSET in the USA (https://www.onsetcomp.com/products/data-loggers/u22-001)
The data table was processed and quality controlled by a particular person based on the observation record, and the data with obvious errors were removed. The data have been published in relevant academic journals in strict accordance with relevant regulations.
These data could be applied in modern lake science, hydrologic model research and other fields.
Water depth, unit: m
Temperature, unit: Celsius (°C)
Data accuracy: ±0.2 °C
metadata.descriptionCn:
班公错、达则错湖水温度监测数据，包含不同水深湖水温度数值。
数据采集时间：
班公错：2012年7月30日 至 2013年8月20日
达则错：2012年8月18日 至 2013年8月29日
数据采样间隔：1小时
数据采集所用的仪器：美国ONSET公司的HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 型温度计（https://www.onsetcomp.com/products/data-loggers/u22-001）
本数据表是由专人根据观测记录进行加工和质量控制，剔除了明显的误差数据。严格按相关规程操作，数据已在相关学术期刊发表。
应用于现代湖泊学、水文学模型研究等领域。

水深，单位：m
温度，单位：摄氏度（℃）
数据精度：±0.2℃

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific characteristics and precision levels are necessary for temperature sensors used in lake water temperature monitoring?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于湖水温度监测的温度传感器所需的具体特性和精度水平是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: precision of ±0.2℃, HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 thermometer
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 精度为±0.2℃，HOBO水温专业版V2 U22-001温度计

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the data sampling interval for the lake water temperature monitoring dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 湖水温度监测数据集的数据采样间隔是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the purpose and methodology of using HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 temperature loggers in lake water temperature monitoring?
Definition.QuestionCn: HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001温度记录仪在湖水温度监测中的目的和方法是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 temperature loggers are used for monitoring lake water temperature at different depths. These loggers record temperature data with a precision of ±0.2°C and are deployed at regular intervals of 1 hour. Data collected is subject to processing and quality control by specialists to remove obvious errors, ensuring adherence to standard protocols for accurate and reliable results. These methods support research in modern limnology and hydrological modeling.
Definition.AnswerCn: HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 温度记录仪用于监测不同深度的湖水温度。这些记录仪以 ±0.2°C 的精度记录温度数据，并以每小时 1 次的间隔进行部署。收集的数据经过专家的处理和质量控制，以去除明显的错误，确保遵循标准协议以获得准确可靠的结果。这些方法支持现代湖沼学和水文模型研究。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methods might researchers use to ensure data accuracy and reliability when collecting hourly water temperature measurements in remote lake environments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 研究人员可能会使用哪些方法来确保在偏远湖泊环境中收集每小时水温测量数据的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: To ensure data accuracy and reliability when collecting hourly water temperature measurements in remote lake environments, researchers can employ high-precision instruments such as the HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 thermometer, which offers a precision of ±0.2℃. Additionally, data must undergo thorough processing and quality control to remove obvious errors, strictly adhering to relevant procedural guidelines. Such measures help maintain the integrity of the dataset, as evidenced by its publication in academic journals.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 为了确保在偏远湖泊环境中收集的每小时水温测量数据的准确性和可靠性，研究人员可以使用高精度仪器，如HOBO水温计Pro V2 U22-001，该仪器的精度为±0.2℃。此外，数据必须经过彻底处理和质量控制，以去除明显的错误，严格遵循相关的程序指南。这些措施有助于维护数据集的完整性，正如其在学术期刊上发表所证明的那样。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes might lead to errors in the water temperature data collected from lakes with varying depths and what are the implications for hydrological modeling?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致从不同深度湖泊收集的水温数据出现错误的原因可能包括：测量设备的精度和校准问题、环境因素（如风、阳光、降雨等）对水温的影响、采样时间和频率的不一致、湖泊的水流动性和混合程度、以及数据记录和传输过程中的错误等。这些错误对水文模型的影响可能包括：模型预测的不准确性、对水资源管理和生态保护决策的误导、以及对气候变化影响评估的偏差等。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Errors in water temperature data can arise from several factors, such as instrument calibration errors, environmental interference, or human error during data processing. The precision of the temperature sensors is ±0.2℃, suggesting that slight deviations might occur due to sensor limitations. Additionally, variations in water movement and stratification can impact measurements at different depths. These errors can affect the accuracy of hydrological models that rely on precise temperature data to simulate lake behavior and water cycle dynamics.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 水温数据中的错误可能源于多个因素，例如仪器校准错误、环境干扰或数据处理中的人为错误。温度传感器的精度为±0.2℃，这表明由于传感器的限制，可能会出现轻微的偏差。此外，水流动和分层的变化可能会影响不同深度的测量。这些错误可能会影响依赖精确温度数据来模拟湖泊行为和水循环动态的水文模型的准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to monitor lake water temperature at different depths using hourly intervals in hydrological and modern lake studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在水文和现代湖泊研究中，以每小时间隔监测不同深度的湖水温度是重要的，原因如下：
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Monitoring lake water temperature at different depths with hourly intervals is crucial for understanding thermal stratification, diurnal temperature variations, and their implications on ecological and hydrological processes. It also aids in developing accurate hydrological models and potentially informs climate change studies by providing data on how lake temperatures respond to atmospheric conditions over time.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 以每小时的间隔监测不同深度的湖水温度对于理解热分层、昼夜温度变化及其对生态和水文过程的影响至关重要。这也有助于开发准确的水文模型，并可能为气候变化研究提供数据，了解湖泊温度如何随时间响应大气条件。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements or instruments enable the precise monitoring of lake water temperatures at various depths over extended periods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步或仪器能够在较长时间内精确监测湖泊不同深度的水温？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of the HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001 temperature logger from ONSET enables precise monitoring of lake water temperatures at various depths. This device provides data collection with an accuracy of ±0.2°C at hourly intervals, allowing for detailed temporal resolution over extended periods.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用ONSET的HOBO Water Temperature Pro V2 U22-001温度记录仪可以精确监测湖水在不同深度的温度。该设备以±0.2°C的精度每小时收集数据，允许在较长时间内进行详细的时间分辨率监测。
